vaults.description: A single‑LP strategy on Berachain for the BYUSD-HONEY pair. It offers a conservative stablecoin LP option with steady returns and capital preservation.
A specialized vault on Charm.fi. Strategy focuses on a single LP position, offering exposure to the projected upside from token pair dynamics, while maintaining a risk profile.
